title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Science Learning Journal Design Using Gradual Fading-Out Techniques

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners maintain learning journals applying cognitive strategies (concept linking, experimental analysis) in over 80% of weekly science project entries
Learners autonomously utilize metacognitive strategies (self-assessment, goal resetting) with over 70% proficiency by the semester's end
Learners demonstrate a reflection level improved by over 25% compared to the previous grade level after applying the gradual fading-out technique in project evaluations

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
